long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove the background from an image using pixcleaner background remover.

Remove the background from any image online url, simply past an image URL and click "Remove Background". From there you can download the result directly to your laptop.

Note: This extension does not store any information.
